body:
Been watching alot of movies lately, and recently i got back into watching one of my favorite
movies i used to watch when i was younger.

And i wanna get into watching alot more movies, whether it be upcoming or old, any genre
and it could even be from like the 1960's.

Just post down below your favorite movie scene(s) from a movie you like/watched
(don't post scenes which are sexually inappropriate for forum rules sake)

Here is/are my favorite movie scene(s) from the movie i was talking about
The Pacific - Part 1 - Battle of Tenaru/Guadalcanal
https://youtu.be/maMQcutkHFw
The Pacific - Part 5 - Peleliu Beach Landing
https://youtu.be/1RMUuXhB1Bc
The Pacific - Part 5 - Jap Tank vs Mortar Squad and M8 Sherman
https://youtu.be/t9Pt5mS8Ysg
